What is the latest example of this.  Am I doing any worse than 
Hotie4U?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jeepers Creepers" <1641coburn@r...> wrote:
> OOC:  Dewboy, what in the blue hell is your problem, you sssssick 
freak!  Everyday you post crap on NBWRPG!  Be warned, everybody!  Now 
that I'm back, there's No Way Out!  Oh, and I hope nobody has a 
problem with my latest transformer...
> 
> BIC:   
> 
> An oasis lay in a hot, arid desert in Africa.  Now, this wasn't any 
old oasis.  Oh no, this oasis was different.  Something was ready to 
rise up.  The sky in the desert started to turn into a dark, twilight 
purple.  The water of the oasis started slowly turning, but then it 
grew into a violent, raging swirl.  The sky grew grimmer and grimmer. 
 A forceful wind swept across the wind, and tore the two trees at the 
oasis right out of the ground.  And finally, WHAM!  A huge bolt of 
lightning struck the water!  The water stopped swirling, and the wind 
stopped as well.  The sky went back to it's sunny self.  Everything 
was quiet.  It was quiet, however, until the ground started rumbling. 
 Suddenly, there was a huge explosion, and water and sand flew 
everywhere!  And once the dust settled, there was flames in the empty 
oasis, and in the flames was a large robot.......a transformer.  The 
transformer's plating was all red, and on his chest and legs, there 
were the shape of flames coloured black.  The transformer's left arm 
was not red, however, and was just silver.  The transformer's face was 
red with black stripes going diagonally downward to the left.  On his 
right hand, he had a strange black glove, and on the left hand, a 
black wrist guard thing.  The transformer walked out of the fire, and 
pulled his glove down.  Then, the transformer slowly said, "I 
am........Kane......."
